spawn_agibot.description: Spawn a new AGIBot instance to handle a specific task asynchronously. Useful for complex task decomposition and parallel execution.

task_description.description: Description of the task for the new AGIBot instance

agent_id.description: Custom agent ID (optional, will auto-generate if not provided). Must match format 'agent_XXX' where XXX is a 3-digit number

output_directory.description: Directory where the new AGIBot should save its output (optional, uses parent's if not provided)

api_key.description: API key for the new instance (optional, will use current if not provided)

model.description: Model name for the new instance (optional, will use current if not provided)

max_loops.description: Maximum execution loops for the new instance (default: 25)

shared_workspace.description: Whether to share parent's workspace directory (default: true)

wait_for_completion.description: Whether to wait for completion before returning (default: false)

MCP_config_file.description: Custom MCP configuration file path (optional, defaults to 'config/mcp_servers.json')

prompts_folder.description: Custom prompts folder path (optional, defaults to 'prompts'). Allows using different prompt templates and tool interfaces

send_message_to_agent_or_manager.description: Send a direct message to a specific agent or manager for communication between agents. Use 'manager' as receiver_id to send messages to the manager.

receiver_id.description: Target agent ID to send message to (use 'manager' for manager)

message_type.description: Message type (status_update, task_request, collaboration, broadcast, system, error)

priority.description: Message priority (low, normal, high, urgent) - default: normal

broadcast_message_to_agents.description: Send a message to all active agents in the system.

get_agent_messages.description: Get messages from current agent's mailbox. Messages are automatically marked as read after retrieval.

send_status_update_to_manager.description: Send a status update from an agent to the manager about task progress.

agent_id.description: ID of the agent sending the update. ALWAYS use 'current_agent' to auto-detect the correct agent ID.

tool_calls_summary.description: List of tool names called in this round

current_task_description.description: Description of current task being worked on

error_message.description: Error message if any error occurred

get_agent_session_info.description: Get comprehensive information about current agent session including session statistics, agent details, and list of all active agents.

terminate_agibot.description: Terminate a specific AGIBot agent. Use 'self' or leave agent_id empty to terminate current agent. This sends a terminate signal to the agent, causing it to stop execution and clean up resources.

agent_id.description: ID of the agent to terminate. Use 'self' or leave empty to terminate current agent.

get_realtime_fairness_report.description: Get detailed real-time fairness report showing ROUND-LEVEL resource distribution balance among all agents. This shows how many rounds each agent has executed, not just instance spawning. Essential for monitoring round-by-round fairness in multi-agent execution.
